name: Cats VS Rats (Gaming Project at VT)
name_original: Cats VS Rats (Gaming Project at VT)
description:
Defend your scrumptious cheese from the menacing (and probably very smelly) rats in this engaging tower defense game! Place four varieties of cats across the map to save your milky morsel. But, be careful! If the rats make it through the top path, they'll evolve special traits and be back with a vengeance!

Controls:
Mouse: Move Cat (Ironic, we know)
Left click: Place Cat
Esc: Pause
Mouse after clicking "Sell": Sell Cat

Credits:
Kurtis St. Thomas : Music
Jordan Bashar : SFX
Michael Pigeon : Art
Keith Khan : Art
Mateo de la Rosa : Programming
Isaac Thompson : Programming

Made during the Fall 2021 Gaming Project Game Jam with the theme Evolution.
